column4: I'm using Ubuntu on a laptop, and whenever my laptop is idle for ten minutes (like when I'm watching a movie), the screen turns blank. I have turned off all my screensavers, but the problem persists. Can anyone help?
the movie playback application should have that option in there somewhere
But it's not JUST movies. Like even if I leave my laptop idle (not doing anything), the screen turns blank, and I do not want that to happen
